channel.title: In NEED of help coding [Allstar] source
channel.description:
Skype: [b]Live:dylan.turner[/b]
Skype me if your up for it
hey I will be a 24/7 host of an allstar sourced rsps I am in need of help coding I am pretty amateur and only really know the basics am looking for a coder to help with:
I accidently got the wrong source and my version has not patched the staffzone where normal players can get partyhats
fixing the trade dupe
fixing blood runes
creating an auto restarter
deleting tele-grab (useless spell which can cause a lot of dupe)
And I am not asking for you to solve any of these problems im just asking for help with them and become owners in co with me.

item.title: In NEED of help coding [Allstar] source
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

dylaster5:

Rage!!! You are a legend i have played allstar servers for over like 5 years ive had alot of names. Add me on skype and we can talk. Im sure if i give you my old usernames you will remember. I know you are a badass coder and seen some of your work. Btw im not the original slayer of course but i remember playing that source with you like 3-4 years ago

LOL! :palm:

BTW what’s up Rage, if you remembah me.

Read full topic
